title: Episode 188: The Elegance of a Formula with Darian Harvin
itunes:title: Episode 188: The Elegance of a Formula with Darian Harvin
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree stick to their workouts and are on their way to being swole. Then, Darian Harvin joins them to chat about the evolution of her pandemic self-care, the work she’s doing in the cannabis space, and the celebrity skincare line she loves. ...
description:
Kate and Doree stick to their workouts and are on their way to being swole. Then, Darian Harvin joins them to chat about the evolution of her pandemic self-care, the work she’s doing in the cannabis space, and the celebrity skincare line she loves.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
